item.title: Short notes on writing documentation in markdown and asciidoc
item.description: Writing documentation in markdown and asciidoc references Markdown Style Guide - Ciro Santilli Tools all numbers under 10 should be written in full npm install write-good for strong formal technical writing, this is good. also handles general grammar and tone Pip install proselint proselint is nice bc python. It is subjective gem install mdl CocInstall coc-markdownlint USAGE: mdl filename mdl uses rules can turn off rules with -r ~MD0013,etc coc-markdownlint uses mdl but asynchronously Gem install kramdown-asciidoc USAGE: kramdown pathtofile -o output sometimes you write in markdown when you want to submit something and forget.
